name: pack-tool-log-entry-standalone
description: Standalone agent can use log_entry pack tool
given: Standalone agent running with mux backend
when: Send message asking to use log_entry tool
then: Tool returns success with entry ID

name: pack-tool-log-search-standalone
description: Standalone agent can use log_search pack tool
given: Standalone agent running with mux backend
when: Send message asking to search logs

name: pack-tool-log-entry-swarm
description: Swarm agent can use log_entry pack tool via gRPC route
given: Workspace agent registered with mux backend
when: Send message to swarm agent asking to use log_entry

name: pack-tool-concurrent
description: Multiple agents can use pack tools concurrently
given: All agents have pack tools available
when: Send pack tool requests to multiple agents simultaneously
